name: Apple Inc.
description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables and accessories.

name: Alphabet Inc.
description: Alphabet Inc. is a holding company that offers products and platforms in advertising, search, operating systems and platforms, enterprise and hardware products.

name: Microsoft Corporation
description: Microsoft Corporation develops, licenses, and supports software, services, devices, and solutions worldwide.

name: Amazon.com Inc.
description: Amazon.com Inc. is an online retailer that offers a wide range of products and services through its e-commerce platform.

name: Tesla Inc.
description: Tesla Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells electric vehicles and energy generation and storage systems.

name: NVIDIA Corporation
description: NVIDIA Corporation designs graphics processing units for the gaming and professional markets, as well as system on a chip units for the mobile computing and automotive market.

name: Meta Platforms Inc.
description: Meta Platforms Inc. builds technologies that help people connect, find communities, and grow businesses.

name: Berkshire Hathaway Inc.
description: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. is a holding company owning subsidiaries engaged in insurance, freight rail transportation, energy generation and distribution, manufacturing, and retailing.

name: JPMorgan Chase & Co.
description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. is a financial holding company that provides financial and investment banking services.

name: Johnson & Johnson
description: Johnson & Johnson is a holding company that researches and develops, manufactures and sells products in healthcare.
